channel.title: Anti random help
channel.description:
well i am trying to make a power fisher and i have tested it, it works fine but i have no anti random protector on it, the first random i got was a whirlpool because it has the same light colors and this fishing spot and still give you the Lure option it just kept on clicking it, the second random was the mysteries old man with his "strange box".
i still haven't had any of there other randoms associated with fishing but i would also like help with them too.

item.title: Anti random help
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Use the procedure findnormalrandoms; for day to day randoms.
Use the SRL manual for anti randoms help, i give you the antirandoms page.
Hope its useful.

[b]
AntiRandoms.scar

var ScapeRune: Integer;
Description:
Bitmap Mask of the words ScapeRune.

function SRLReportInStyle(Number: Integer): String;
By: Dankness
Description:
Preps SRL Randoms Report Window.

procedure SRLRandomsReport;
By: Dankness
Description:
Displays Randoms Report.

function FindMod: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Results True if a mod is found, then it waits 10-20 mins and logs back in

function FindFight: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Results True if in Fight

function InConvo: Boolean;
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
checks for presence of black separator line indicating a random is talking to us.

function FindName: Boolean;
By: Renax
Description:
Check whole screen for bitmap of nickname. Use a short nick…
Results true if nickname found

procedure FixChat;
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Sets Chat settings to XXX.

procedure DwarfItem;
By: Sumilion
Description:
Drops Items left by Dwarf

function FindForester: Boolean;
By: Dankness
Description:
Logs out for Freaky Forrester.

function FindLamp(skill: String): Boolean;
By: Pups and Starblaster100
Description:
handles Genie. Results True if lamp found and handled.
skill: Skill to use with lamp eg. ‘strength’, ‘attack’, etc.

function SolveGenie(skill: String): Boolean;
By: Starblaster100 & Mutant Squirrle
Description:
Returns true if the lamp is found and solved.

function FindDead: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Checks for text “Ow dear you are dead”.
Switches player if Reincarnate = True.

function FindMime: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Checks for mime and switches player.

function FindMaze: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Checks for Maze and switches player.

procedure CreateScapeRune;
By: WT-Fawaki
Description:
Creates ScapeRune Bitmap Mask.

function FindScapeRune: Boolean;
By: Dankness modifyed by WT-Fawaki
Description:
Checks for text “ScapeRune” and Logs Out Player.
Will Logout for All Evil Bob Randoms, and Most Pete Randoms Too!

function SolvePinball: Boolean;
By: pups
Description:
Solves the pinball random.

function FindPlant: Boolean;
By:
Description:
Handles Plant. Results True if found.

function WeAreDead: Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo
Description:
Results true if we died.

procedure TakeScreen(reason: String; event: Integer);
By: Mutant Squirrle
Description:
Takes a screenshot.

function FindTrade: Boolean;
By: WT-Fakawi modified by Cheesehunk.
Description:
Returns true if a trade is found.

function InBlack: Boolean;
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Checks for the existence of 4 blackdots in MM indicating a random event has occured.
Checks MMpixels Upper N-E-S-WUSE WITH CARE: DONT USE IN DUNGEONS I.E. MININGGUILD.

function NoGameTab: Boolean;
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Checks for the existence of GameTab 4 in relation to the non-existence of GameTab 3 (Quests) and Gametab 12 (controls).

function SolveTalkingRandom(RawMenuText: String): Boolean;
By: SRL Developers Team.
Description:
Talking Random Handler. Called by FindTalkingRandom. (FindTalk)

function ChooseOptionGetMenuText(var RawMenuText: String; x, y: Integer; txt: String): Boolean;
By: Stupid3ooo, modded by WT-Fakawi.
Description:
Finds Popup menu, then clicks on it, returns text next to txt

procedure SetScreenName(ScreenName: String);
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Sets screenname for use with FindTalk and one Player.

function FindTalk: Boolean;
By: Renax
Description:
Searches screen for NickName and handles ALL Talking Randoms

function FindNormalRandoms: Boolean;
By: The SRL Developers Team!.. all time sexiness by Mutant
Description:
Calls the ‘normal’ random checks.

procedure BoredHuman;
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Perform2 5-15 times:
* Rotates the cam,
* Moves the mouse around MainScreen,
* If it finds IsUpText(‘option’), it will Chooseoption(‘Examine’);

procedure RandomMovement;
By: Krazy_Meerkat
Description:
Presses random arrow keys and moves the mouse. Able to press 2 keys simultaneously.

procedure Wait2(timetowait: Integer; Randoms: Boolean);
By: Krazy_Meerkat
Description:
Similar to bored human, finds randoms, anti-idles. Converted from my include.

procedure FTWait(Time: Integer);
By: WT-Fakawi
Description:
Performs Wait and FindTalk. Time is multiple of 250 msec, so FTWait(4)
waits approx 1 sec and performs 4 FindTalks;
[/b]

If you need Anti ban post or pm.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti random help
item.dc:creator: @steveinater steveinater
item.description:
@steveinater wrote:

well i am trying to make a power fisher and i have tested it, it works fine but i have no anti random protector on it, the first random i got was a whirlpool because it has the same light colors and this fishing spot and still give you the Lure option it just kept on clicking it, the second random was the mysteries old man with his “strange box”.

i still haven’t had any of there other randoms associated with fishing but i would also like help with them too.
